title: Root schema.
description: An explanation about the puropose of this instance described by this schema.

token.description: Information about the json web token; how to encrypt it and when it expires.

secret.description: The secret used to encrypt the token.

expiresIn.description: Amount of seconds before the token expires.

session.description: Information about the client session; how to encrypt it and when it expires.

secret.description: The secret used to encrypt the session.

expiresIn.description: Amount of seconds before the session expires.

base.description: The base URI of the web application (e.g. https://localhost:8080).

login.description: The path (relative to the base URI) to the login view.

logout.description: The path (relative to the base URI) to the logout view.
